definition: to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
to move up and down/to undulate/ups and downs

up here, down there (idiom); to rise and fall in succession/no sooner one subsides, the next arises/repeating continuously/occurring again and again (of applause, fires, waves, protests, conflicts, uprisings etc)
to ambush/to lie in wait for/to lie low/ambush
foreshadowing (literary device)/foretaste of material to come (in essay or story)
Ambush from Ten Sides (pipa solo piece)/House of Flying Daggers (2004 movie by Zhang Yimou 張藝謀|张艺谋[Zhang1 Yi4 mou2])
volt-ampere (measure of apparent power in alternating current circuits)
Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing

sentences.english: For these reasons, Provo tied for second-to-last inisland rankings published in the November/December 2007 issue of themagazine.
sentences.chinese: 由于这些原因，普罗伏在此榜单上位列倒数第二。

sentences.english: Volta showed that this was not so.
sentences.chinese: 他的本国同胞伏打指出，情况并非如此。

sentences.english: Part Two591. The packing must be able to withstand rough handling.
sentences.chinese: 包装必须经得伏蛮横搬运。

sentences.english: The unit shall be equipped with a standard 120V plug-in cord.
sentences.chinese: 这种热水器应该配置一个标准的120伏插头电缆。

sentences.english: Therefore I will be unto them as a lion: as a leopard by the way will I observe them
sentences.chinese: 因此，我向他们如狮子，又如豹伏在道旁。

sentences.english: I need some 24 volt fans like in the attached picture.
sentences.chinese: 我需要的就是象附件中的照片里那样的24伏的风扇。

sentences.english: Markets will rise and fall, but this is the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 市场有起有伏，但这里是美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: Input voltage peak limited to 600V for DC and low frequency.
sentences.chinese: 对直流和低频输入电压的峰值上限为600伏。

sentences.english: Permancet magnet DC motor, 220V, 50Hz, single phase.
sentences.chinese: 永磁直流电机，220伏，50赫兹，单相。

sentences.english: An archaeologically valuable ancient tomb was unearthed in the underlying soil of this corn field.
sentences.chinese: 这片玉米地下伏土层中出土了一个有考古价值的古墓。

sentences.english: However, the resistance of standard strain to minimum bactericidal concentration of iodophor was slightly higher than that of clinically isolated strains.
sentences.chinese: 但标准株对碘伏最小杀菌浓度略高于临床分离株。

sentences.english: Remember, everyone encounters good daysbad days on the job.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了，每个人在工作中都会有起有伏。

sentences.english: Electricity in Britain is 240 volts, AC.
sentences.chinese: 英国的电压是交流电240伏。

sentences.english: Verhofstadt congratulated China on its accession to the WTO.
sentences.chinese: 伏思达祝贺中国加入世贸组织。

sentences.english: The circuit should oscillate at 6 volts in, maybe somewhat less.
sentences.chinese: 该电路振荡频率为6伏，也许少了几分。

sentences.english: He thought, for acute pyelitis, the beginning was a new affection syndrome and aincubative pathogen syndrome secondly.
sentences.chinese: 急性肾盂炎初呈新感之症状，继现伏邪之体征。
